summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a potential off-the-record meeting with a sultan. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and includes a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, suggesting a meeting with a sultan.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, being invited to meet with a sultan off the record.

connections.description: Epstein is reaching out to Staley for a potential meeting with a sultan, indicating a level of trust and familiarity.

keyFacts: Epstein suggests a one-on-one meeting with a sultan for Staley.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
The email contains a warning about the confidentiality of its contents.
